en_us: Max out your Heart Canister health
Introduces two tiers of pricey canisters that increase your health when carried.
Heart Canisters can be used to increase health. Up to 20 additional hearts can be obtained.\n\nThey can be crafted in a Custom Crafter using golden apples and a powerful core.
The recipes for a heart canister is as follows:
Tier 2 heart canisters can be crafted with tier 1 canisters.
Each heart canister will give 2 extra hearts.\n\nOnly up to five of each heart canister tier will give extra health.
